title: LF free coaching silver 1
body:
hello there im looking for someone out there who would take the time to coach me im currently oce silver 1 i main top lane ( irelia )
i play jg ( lee sin ) as a second option , i would like to get better at the game and yes this is my 2nd account my main account is silver 5 
but ill be using this account as my main from now on , any help would be great i know it would take time but im willing to stick it out and be coached
as id like to aim for high gold or low plat

ps: im sorry to say im not made of money so i cant just pay someone to help so im asking on here

if anyone is interested add me in game : NM2

thanks :)

replies.body:
http://www.lol-coaching.com/coaches.php

Take a look at that, they have paid and free coaches. Some of them are quite good.
